definition: A specific domain or area of knowledge, expertise, or activity, often associated with a particular field or subject matter. It is commonly used to refer to a distinct section or realm within a larger context, such as a specific department within an organization, a particular subject area within academia, or a specialized field within a profession.

examples.english: I work in the marketing field
That is not my area of expertise
